headline: A Fast, Secure Migration to Google Cloud Platform using Cloudflare
keywords: Webinars, Google Cloud, Events, Security, Speed & Reliability, API
description:
OnAir Video Presentation




Abstract


Looking to host your website, application, or API in the cloud, or migrate to a new cloud provider while keeping your data secure? In this webinar, Trey Guinn, Head of Solutions Engineering at Cloudflare, will discuss how companies should approach security, during and after migration. We'll highlight the migration story of LUSH, one of the largest global e-Commerce cosmetic retailers, and how they took the right steps to migrate from their previous cloud p
